alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Box Elder...northwestern Salt Lake...southwestern Davis and northeastern Tooele Counties through 715 PM MDT... At 631 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles north of Delle to near Bingham Canyon Mine. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Tooele, Grantsville, Stansbury Park, Delle, Salt Lake City International Airport, Tooele Army Depot, Magna, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Stockton, Hat Island, Erda, Lake Point and Antelope Island State Park. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 61 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys
